mapper.select: select l.lno,l.l_m_id ,m.username, g.gno,g.gname,g.actionstatus,g.lowestprice,g.enddate from likes l join member m on l.l_m_id = m.id join goods g on l.l_g_gno = g.gno

select l.lno,l.l_m_id ,m.username, g.gno,g.gname,g.actionstatus,g.lowestprice,g.enddate,f.f_name from likes l join member m on l.l_m_id = m.id join goods g on l.l_g_gno = g.gno join goodsfile f on l.l_g_gno = f.f_g_gno order by lno desc limit #{displayPost}, #{postNum}
